name: Sherwin Jefferson Tajan
description: A Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (BSIT) graduate with a strong passion for back-end development. I am currently working as an ICT Teacher at a small school in Tanauan, Batangas, where I educate and inspire students in the field of technology. As I pursue a career in back-end development, I focus on designing and optimizing server-side applications, databases, and APIs to ensure seamless and efficient system performance. My goal is to develop scalable and reliable solutions that enhance user experiences and drive innovation. This portfolio highlights my skills, projects, and experiences.
